title: Russia-Ukraine war LIVE updates: Putin, Macron discuss Russian 'military operation' in Ukraine: Kremlin - India Today
content:
1. Russia-Ukraine war LIVE updates: Putin, Macron discuss Russian 'military operation' in Ukraine: Kremlin  India Today
  2. Russia-Ukraine crisis Live: Russian forces seize Chernobyl nuclear plant in Ukraine  The Indian Express
  3. Russia Says Destroyed Ukraine Airbases, Ground Forces Cross Over  NDTV
  4. Missiles rain down around Ukraine  Reuters
  5. Opinion | Why Ukraine — and Russia's aggression against it — matters to Americans  The Washington Post
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Russia-Ukraine war news LIVE updates: Ukraine has severed diplomatic ties with Russia after Russian President Vladimir Putin ordered troops into eastern Ukraine on Thursday. Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenksyy compared Russia's actions to that of Nazi Germany during World War II and called upon Russians to stage protests against President Putin's decision. NATO envoys, meanwhile, convened an emergency session to discuss the situation unfolding in Kyiv. Neighbouring country Lithuania has declared a state of emergency, while Moldova has shut its airspace. Stay tuned to IndiaToday.in for LIVE LATEST UPDATES on the Russian invasion of Ukraine.
